main.name: Rahul Sahastrabuddhe
main.description: Securing clouds, sparking innovation, and having fun. Check out my Cloud Security journey!
main.bio: Cloud Security Engineer IV at Credit Karma, Charlotte, NC. Master's in Computer Science (UT Dallas). Experienced in cloud security, automation, and web technologies. Passionate about building secure, scalable solutions.
main.background: Over 2 years of Security Engineering and 3 years of Software Engineering experience.
main.contactmessage: Want to hire me? Please contact below.

work.title: Cloud Security Engineering IV
description: Enrolled Wiz vulnerability management solution on CreditKarma’s cloud infrastructure for improved visibility and protection against zero days and misconfigurations.
Improved website defence against bot attacks by implementing browser impersonator detection and mitigation controls.
Automated security DM notifications to targeted employees via Slack using tines automation.
Streamlined docker image approval with automation and Jira ticketing for compliance tracking.

work.title: Cloud Security Engineering III
description: Secured web and mobile endpoints with WAF, defending against DDoS, XSS, and CSRF attacks.
Automated vulnerability scanning in Python for GCP EOL software compliance.
Led development of Risk Register (React, Node.js, GraphQL) for security risk tracking.
Developed GenAI tool (LangChain) for real-time incident analysis of WAF logs via chatbot.

work.title: Security Engineering Intern
description: POC for tool scanning Google Engine VMs for cleartext secrets and alerting SOC team.

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Created desktop app in C#, MySQL for project utilization and budgeting, saving management time.
Enhanced employee management app with Angular 8 web support for improved usability.
